Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another "Full Power" 
or "Androids/Cell Saga" Category ally on the team upon the 
character's entry*
- {passiveImg:once}Launches an additional attack that has a medium chance 
of becoming a Super Attack per existing enemy (up to 5 times within 
a turn) and launches 2 additional Super Attacks for 4 turns
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +5
- ATK & DEF 258%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Guards all attacks
- Damage reduction rate 20%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Receives an additional Ki +1 per Ki Sphere obtained
*When attacking*
- ATK 158%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every attack performed*
- {passiveImg:forever}Ki +1 (up to +5)
- {passiveImg:forever}ATK & DEF 10%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 80%)
*When receiving an attack*
- DEF 158%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Starting from the 5th turn from the character's entry turn*
- ATK 158%{passiveImg:up_g} and DEF 58%{passiveImg:up_g} when attacking with 18 or more Ki
- Performs a critical hit when activating the Active Skill or when 
attacking with 24 Ki

7276.superDescription:
Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn, 
causes colossal damage to enemy 
and lowers DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

7277.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn, 
causes mega-colossal damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers DEF

SpecialBonus.Description: Super Attack power will be increased even more!

Active Skill.Name: Father-Son Kamehameha
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there is another 
"Kamehameha" Category ally on the team 
starting from the 5th turn from the character's 
entry turn, or when facing only 1 enemy, whose 
HP is 89% or less, starting from the 5th turn 
from the character's entry turn (once only)
